```{python}
#| label: fig-bar
#| fig-cap: A bar chart

import altair as alt
import pandas as pd

source = pd.DataFrame({
    'a': ['甲', 'B', 'C', 'D', 'E', 'F', 'G', 'H', 'I'],
    'b': [28, 55, 43, 91, 81, 53, 19, 87, 52]
})

alt.Chart(source).mark_bar().encode(
    x='a',
    y='b'
)
```
